entries.title: Rare, green comet to pass by Earth Wednesday
entries.description: The night sky will look a tiny bit greener this week as a rare comet travels close to Earth.

entries.title: How George Santos' ex-boyfriends say they were left feeling trapped, manipulated
entries.description: Multiple men have described to ABC News past relationships with Rep. George Santos that they said turned toxic due to a flood of lies Santos told them.

entries.title: Man dies after apparently falling off cliff in Puerto Rico
entries.description: The U.S. Coast Guard called off its search for a man who fell off a 70-foot cliff in Puerto Rico after a dive team recovered his body on Monday, according officials.

entries.title: Minnesota governor signs broad abortion rights bill into law
entries.description: Gov. Tim Walz enshrined the right to abortion and other reproductive health care

entries.title: VP Harris to attend Tyre Nichols' funeral after speaking with his mom
entries.description: Vice President Kamala Harris will travel to Memphis, Tennessee, to attend Tyre Nichols' funeral on Wednesday.

entries.title: Ugandan activist's family awarded $10.5M for Utah park death
entries.description: The United States will pay more than $10 million in damages over the death of Esther Nakajjigo, a prominent Ugandan human rights activist killed in Arches National Park in 2020

entries.title: FBI searched Biden's old office after his lawyers found classified docs: Sources
entries.description: The FBI searched the Penn Biden Center in November soon after Joe Biden's lawyers reported finding classified documents at a former office he used there, sources say

entries.title: Involuntary manslaughter charges formally filed against Alec Baldwin
entries.description: Three people -- including star Alec Baldwin -- face charges after cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was fatally shot on the set of "Rust" in 2021.

entries.title: DeSantis pushes ban on diversity programs in state colleges
entries.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has announced plans to block state colleges from having programs on diversity, equity and inclusion, and critical race theory

entries.title: Omaha police fatally shoot armed man in Target store
entries.description: Omaha police say they have fatally shot a man who entered a Target store with an AR-15-style rifle and “plenty of ammunition.”

entries.title: Manhunt underway for man accused of torturing woman: Police
entries.description: A manhunt is underway in Oregon for a man accused of torturing a woman who authorities believe uses dating apps to find victims or people to help him evade police.

entries.title: 15 students in Mexico treated for internet drug 'challenge'
entries.description: Fifteen grade school students in Mexico have been treated after apparently taking part in an internet “challenge” in which groups of students take tranquilizers to see who can stay awake the longest

entries.title: Biden unveils nearly $300 million in federal funding for Hudson Tunnel Project
entries.description: President Joe Biden is on the road again to pitch Americans on the benefits of the new infrastructure law passed last year with a stop Tuesday in New York.

entries.title: Drug dealer convicted in deaths of 3 New Yorkers on same day
entries.description: Billy Ortega was convicted of federal charges for the deaths of three New Yorkers he sold cocaine laced with fentanyl to.

entries.title: Ice storm slams Texas, crippling roads and closing schools
entries.description: An ice storm is slamming Texas this week, crippling roads, closing schools and cancelling flights.

entries.title: Providence establishes reparations program to praise and criticism
entries.description: Because the money for the program was reallocated from federal COVID relief funds, some white residents may also apply and benefit.

entries.title: Judge drops R. Kelly sex-abuse charges at prosecutor's wish
entries.description: A judge has followed the recommendation of a Chicago prosecutor and dismissed sex-abuse charges against R&B singer R. Kelly

entries.title: To protect salmon population, EPA vetoes controversial Alaska mining project
entries.description: A battle over a proposed gold and copper mine in Alaska may soon reach an end, as the Environmental Protection Agency weighs using its authority to veto the proposal.

entries.title: Detroit-area man convicted of aiding Islamic State in Syria
entries.description: Prosecutors say a Detroit-area man who was captured on a Syrian battlefield in 2018 has been convicted on charges of providing support to the Islamic State group and attending one of the group’s training camps

entries.title: FDA revamping foods program to move past ‘constant turmoil’
entries.description: The head of the Food and Drug Administration has announced an overhaul of the agency's food safety and nutrition division

entries.title: 3 rappers missing for days since Detroit gig was scratched
entries.description: Three aspiring rappers who met in prison have been missing for 10 days.

entries.title: Indiana justices won't hear 2nd abortion case for now
entries.description: Indiana’s high court says it will not immediately consider a challenge to the state’s abortion ban that is based on the argument that the law violates some people’s religious freedoms, leaving that decision to an appeals court, at least for now

entries.title: Santos tells House GOP he'd recuse himself from committee assignments: Sources
entries.description: Santos told House Republicans Tuesday that he would recuse himself from sitting on committees, multiple sources familiar with the matter told ABC News.

entries.title: Man who shot 13-year-old dead outside his home arrested for murder: Police
entries.description: Jason Lewis, the man 13-year-old Karon Blake outside his home earlier this month, has been charged with second-degree murder.

entries.title: Biden to highlight grant for NYC rail tunnel under Hudson
entries.description: President Joe Biden is traveling to New York City to showcase a $292 million mega grant that will be used to help build a rail tunnel beneath the Hudson River

entries.title: Exxon profits at record high in 2022 as energy prices soared
entries.description: Exxon Mobil posted record annual profits for 2022, as Americans struggled with high prices for gasoline, home heating and consumer goods

entries.title: Tesla gets Justice Department subpoena for self-driving cars
entries.description: The U.S. Justice Department has requested documents from Tesla Inc. related to its Autopilot and “Full Self-Driving” features, according to a regulatory filing

entries.title: US wage growth slowed in the final quarter of 2022
entries.description: Pay and benefits for America’s workers grew at a healthy but more gradual pace in the final three months of 2022, the third straight slowdown that could help reassure the Federal Reserve that wage gains won’t fuel higher inflation

entries.title: Adult Happy Meals, McRib, feed McDonald's sales in Q4
entries.description: Adult Happy Meals and other limited-time promotions boosted traffic at McDonald’s restaurants during the fourth quarter despite higher prices

entries.title: Man faces attempted murder charges after allegedly driving family off cliff
entries.description: A California man who prosecutors say intentionally drove his Tesla off a cliff with his family inside is facing attempted murder charges.

entries.title: WATCH:  Observatory captures footage of 'whirlpool' in night sky
entries.description: A flying spiral was captured by the Subaru-Asahi Star Camera located in Hawaii's Mauna Kea Observatory.

entries.title: Asian shares fall in muted trading ahead of Fed meeting
entries.description: Global shares are lower in muted trading as investors await decisions on interest rates and updates on corporate earnings reports from around the world

entries.title: Deadline nears for Alec Baldwin in deadly movie set shooting
entries.description: Prosecutors are scheduled to file involuntary manslaughter charges in connection with the fatal shooting of a cinematographer by actor Alec Baldwin during a rehearsal on the set of a Western movie in 2021

entries.title: How race plays into Tyre Nichols police brutality incident
entries.description: Tyre Nichols, a Black man, died after a violent encounter with police. Five of the six officers connected to the incident were Black. How does race play into this?

entries.title: Global report highlights link between corruption, violence
entries.description: A closely watched study by an anti-graft organization has found that most of the world continues to fail to fight corruption, with 95% of countries having made little to no progress since 2017

entries.title: Boeing bids farewell to last 747 jumbo jet
entries.description: Boeing bids farewell to an icon on Tuesday: It's delivering its final 747 jumbo jet

entries.title: WATCH:  Massive boulder crashes into Hawaii home
entries.description: A security camera inside a Honolulu home captured the moment a boulder came crashing through a family's living room. Fortunately, no one inside the house was injured.

entries.title: ‘Laverne & Shirley’ star Cindy Williams dies at 75, according to family spokesperson
entries.description: "Laverne & Shirley" actress Cindy Williams dies at 75, according to a family spokesperson.

entries.title: Petito family lobbies for 'lethality assessment' law in Utah
entries.description: The mother and father of a woman killed by her boyfriend in 2021 joined Utah lawmakers to lobby for the passage of a law to require police statewide screen for risks of intimate partner violence

entries.title: Stranded humpback whale dies on Long Island beach
entries.description: A 35-foot humpback whale has washed ashore and died on a New York beach

entries.title: Trump sues Bob Woodward for releasing audio of their interviews
entries.description: Donald Trump sued journalist Bob Woodward on Monday, claiming that the audio companion to Woodward's book "Rage" improperly used recordings of his interviews

entries.title: 10 people hurt in mass shooting in Lakeland, Florida: Police
entries.description: A mass shooting in a Florida town has left 10 people wounded, the Lakeland Police Department announced on Monday.

entries.title: 'Laverne & Shirley' actor Cindy Williams dies at 75
entries.description: Williams played Shirley opposite Penny Marshall’s Laverne on the popular sitcom.
